channel.title: Client and server RaR files- Help p0x?
channel.description:
Ok so ive been making a soure for about 6-7 months now and I wantd to make it a RaR file so i can release it soon.
I made a folder with the client and the server files inside them and its a total of 48.9mb.
When i try to make it a rar or zip file, it just stays on "1% done"
Help me if you can? Ty

item.title: Client and server RaR files- Help p0x?
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

Be patient… or re-install winRar by WinRaR

Read full topic
item.source: Client and server RaR files- Help p0x?
